name: Maze Of The Minotaur
description:
This is Maze Of The Minotaur, our entry for Ludum Dare 48. This time I was again joined by Lunavenator.

Please note: I provide a Windows build. The WebGL build is not actively supported. Turn on sounds!

WebGL Note: Unity does not properly support WebGL and raycasting. Therefore, colliders and triggers are offset and you might have trouble selecting objects (as the center of the screen is offset). I recommend using the Windows build!

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Mouse Button - Interaction
  • Left Shift - Sprinting

Changelog:

  • 1.0: Initial Release

In this game you are a treasure hunter that seeks out the wealth of the horns of the minotaur. Solve the puzzles  and get deeper and deeper into the maze...

I mainly support a Windows build for this game. For the Mac, Linux and lazy players out there I also created a WebGL build.

If you want to know exactly how badly I screw up during development you can have a look at the amazing source code and Unity project here on the GitHub project. You also need to have access to Blender and Audacity.
